kv2.7:3.46.pli: Dvecattārīsa kappasahassāni uppādakkhaṇo, dvecattārīsa kappasahassāni vayakkhaṇoti?

kv2.7:4.3.pli: Atthaññe dhammā ekāhaṃ bahumpi uppajjitvā nirujjhantīti?

kv2.7:5.4.pli: “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ yathayidaṃ cittaṃ.

kv2.7:5.5.pli: Yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, upamāpi na sukarā yāva lahuparivattaṃ cittan”ti.

kv2.7:6.4.pli: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, makkaṭo araññe pavane caramāno sākhaṃ gaṇhati, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhati, taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhati;

kv2.7:6.5.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yamidaṃ vuccati cittaṃ itipi mano itipi viññāṇaṃ itipi taṃ rattiyā ca divasassa ca aññadeva uppajjati aññaṃ nirujjhatī”ti.

kv2.7:8.3.pli: Yeneva cittena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, teneva cittena sotena saddaṃ suṇāti …pe…

kv2.7:8.8.pli: yeneva cittena manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti, teneva cittena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati …pe…

kv2.7:9.3.pli: Yeneva cittena abhikkamati, teneva cittena paṭikkamati;

kv2.7:9.4.pli: yeneva cittena paṭikkamati, teneva cittena abhikkamati;

kv2.7:9.5.pli: yeneva cittena āloketi, teneva cittena viloketi;

kv2.7:9.6.pli: yeneva cittena viloketi, teneva cittena āloketi;

kv2.7:9.7.pli: yeneva cittena samiñjeti, teneva cittena pasāreti;

kv2.7:9.8.pli: yeneva cittena pasāreti, teneva cittena samiñjetīti?

kv2.7:10.1.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhatīti?

kv2.7:11.1.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhatīti?

kv2.7:11.23.pli: akaniṭṭhānaṃ devānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhatīti?

kv2.7:12.1.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ vīsati kappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ, ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ vīsati kappasahassāni tiṭṭhatīti?

kv2.7:12.3.pli: Manussānaṃ vassasataṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, manussānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ vassasataṃ tiṭṭhatīti?

kv2.7:13.1.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ vīsati kappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ, ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ vīsati kappasahassāni tiṭṭhatīti?

kv2.7:13.3.pli: Cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ pañca vassasatāni āyuppamāṇaṃ, cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ pañca vassasatāni tiṭṭhati …

kv2.7:13.23.pli: akaniṭṭhānaṃ devānaṃ soḷasa kappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ, akaniṭṭhānaṃ devānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ soḷasa kappasahassāni tiṭṭhatīti?

kv2.7:14.1.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ cittaṃ muhuttaṃ muhuttaṃ uppajjati muhuttaṃ muhuttaṃ nirujjhatīti?

kv2.7:14.3.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā devā muhuttaṃ muhuttaṃ cavanti muhuttaṃ muhuttaṃ uppajjantīti?

kv2.7:15.1.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhatīti?

kv2.7:15.3.pli: Ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā devā yeneva cittena uppajjanti, teneva cittena cavantīti?

kv2.8:1.3.pli: Nanu atthi sukhā vedanā, kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ, cetasikaṃ sukhaṃ, dibbaṃ sukhaṃ, mānusakaṃ sukhaṃ, lābhasukhaṃ, sakkārasukhaṃ, yānasukhaṃ, sayanasukhaṃ, issariyasukhaṃ, ādhipaccasukhaṃ, gihisukhaṃ, sāmaññasukhaṃ, sāsavaṃ sukhaṃ, anāsavaṃ sukhaṃ, upadhisukhaṃ, nirūpadhisukhaṃ, sāmisaṃ sukhaṃ, nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ, sappītikaṃ sukhaṃ, nippītikaṃ sukhaṃ, jhānasukhaṃ, vimuttisukhaṃ, kāmasukhaṃ, nekkhammasukhaṃ, vivekasukhaṃ, upasamasukhaṃ, sambodhasukhanti?

kv2.8:1.6.pli: sambodhasukhaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.8:2.3.pli: Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā vedanā kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ cetasikaṃ dukkhaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassaupāyāsāti?

kv2.8:3.7.pli: Cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, ādittaṃ, rūpā ādittā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, cakkhusamphasso āditto;

kv2.8:3.8.pli: yamidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi ādittaṃ.

kv2.8:3.10.pli: ‘Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittan’ti vadāmi.

kv2.8:3.15.pli: mano āditto, dhammā ādittā, manoviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, manosamphasso āditto;

kv2.8:3.16.pli: yamidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, tampi ādittaṃ.

kv2.8:3.18.pli: ‘Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittan’ti vadāmī”ti.

kv2.8:4.6.pli: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, sotaviññeyyā saddā …pe…

kv2.8:4.9.pli: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.

kv2.8:5.5.pli: “lābhā vo, bhikkhave, suladdhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, khaṇo vo paṭiladdho brahmacariyavāsāya.

kv2.8:5.6.pli: Diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, cha phassāyatanikā nāma nirayā.

kv2.8:5.7.pli: Tattha yaṃ kiñci cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, aniṭṭharūpaññeva passati no iṭṭharūpaṃ, akantarūpaññeva passati no kantarūpaṃ, amanāparūpaññeva passati no manāparūpaṃ.

kv2.8:5.12.pli: manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti, aniṭṭharūpaññeva vijānāti no iṭṭharūpaṃ, akantarūpaññeva vijānāti no kantarūpaṃ, amanāparūpaññeva vijānāti no manāparūpan”ti.

kv2.8:6.4.pli: “lābhā vo, bhikkhave, suladdhaṃ vo, bhikkhave, khaṇo vo paṭiladdho brahmacariyavāsāya.

kv2.8:6.5.pli: Diṭṭhā mayā, bhikkhave, cha phassāyatanikā nāma saggā.

kv2.8:6.6.pli: Tattha yaṃ kiñci cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, iṭṭharūpaññeva passati no aniṭṭharūpaṃ, kantarūpaññeva passati no akantarūpaṃ, manāparūpaññeva passati no amanāparūpaṃ.

kv2.8:6.11.pli: manasā dhammaṃ vijānāti, iṭṭharūpaññeva vijānāti no aniṭṭharūpaṃ, kantarūpaññeva vijānāti no akantarūpaṃ, manāparūpaññeva vijānāti no amanāparūpan”ti.

kv2.8:7.8.pli: “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv2.8:8.3.pli: Dānaṃ aniṭṭhaphalaṃ akantaphalaṃ amanuññaphalaṃ secanakaphalaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākanti?

kv2.8:9.4.pli: brahmacariyaṃ aniṭṭhaphalaṃ akantaphalaṃ amanuññaphalaṃ secanakaphalaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ dukkhavipākanti?

kv2.8:10.1.pli: Nanu dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti?

kv2.8:10.3.pli: Hañci dānaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.8:11.4.pli: brahmacariyaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti?

kv2.8:11.6.pli: Hañci brahmacariyaṃ iṭṭhaphalaṃ kantaphalaṃ manuññaphalaṃ asecanakaphalaṃ sukhudrayaṃ sukhavipākanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.9:5.1.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?

kv2.9:5.2.pli: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ, vicikicchaṃ, sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.

kv2.9:5.3.pli: Catubhāgaṃ sotāpanno, catubhāgaṃ na sotāpanno, catubhāgaṃ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ sattakkhattuparamo kolaṅkolo ekabījī buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme …pe… saṅghe …pe… ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato catubhāgaṃ na ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatoti?

kv2.9:6.4.pli: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ, vicikicchaṃ, sīlabbataparāmāsaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.

kv2.9:6.5.pli: Catubhāgaṃ sotāpanno, catubhāgaṃ na sotāpanno, catubhāgaṃ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ sattakkhattuparamo kolaṅkolo ekabījī buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato, dhamme …pe… saṅghe …pe… ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato, catubhāgaṃ na ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatoti?

kv2.9:7.1.pli: Sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?

kv2.9:7.2.pli: Oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ, oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.

kv2.9:7.3.pli: Catubhāgaṃ sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ na sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv2.9:7.8.pli: Oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgaṃ, oḷārikaṃ byāpādaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.

kv2.9:7.9.pli: Catubhāgaṃ sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ na sakadāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharatīti?

kv2.9:8.1.pli: Anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?

kv2.9:8.2.pli: Aṇusahagataṃ kāmarāgaṃ, aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.

kv2.9:8.3.pli: Catubhāgaṃ anāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ na anāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ antarāparinibbāyī …pe… upahaccaparinibbāyī … asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī … sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī … uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, catubhāgaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmīti?

kv2.9:9.4.pli: Aṇusahagataṃ kāmarāgaṃ, aṇusahagataṃ byāpādaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.

kv2.9:9.5.pli: Catubhāgaṃ anāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ na anāgāmī, catubhāgaṃ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ antarāparinibbāyī …pe… upahaccaparinibbāyī … asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī … sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī … uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, catubhāgaṃ na uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti?

kv2.9:10.1.pli: Arahattasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhadassanena kiṃ jahatīti?

kv2.9:10.2.pli: Rūparāgaṃ, arūparāgaṃ, mānaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, avijjaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.

kv2.9:10.3.pli: Catubhāgaṃ arahā, catubhāgaṃ na arahā, catubhāgaṃ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ vītarāgo …pe… vītadoso … vītamoho …pe… katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ …pe… sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, catubhāgaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?

kv2.9:11.2.pli: Rūparāgaṃ, arūparāgaṃ, mānaṃ, uddhaccaṃ, avijjaṃ, tadekaṭṭhe ca kilese catubhāgaṃ jahatīti.

kv2.9:11.3.pli: Catubhāgaṃ arahā, catubhāgaṃ na arahā, catubhāgaṃ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, catubhāgaṃ vītarāgo …pe… vītadoso … vītamoho … katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvitabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ …pe… sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, catubhāgaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ na sacchikatanti?

kv2.9:12.1.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabboti?

kv2.9:13.1.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo maggaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?

kv2.9:13.3.pli: Dukkhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, dukkhe diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?

kv2.9:13.5.pli: maggaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?

kv2.9:13.8.pli: nirodhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, nirodhe diṭṭhe phale ṭhitoti vattabboti?

kv2.9:14.1.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, dukkhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—

kv2.9:14.4.pli: Maggaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—

kv2.9:14.8.pli: nirodhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, nirodhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—

kv2.9:14.11.pli: Maggaṃ dakkhanto “paṭipannako”ti vattabbo, magge diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—

kv2.9:15.1.pli: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno puggalo dukkhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, dukkhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—

kv2.9:15.7.pli: nirodhaṃ dakkhanto paṭipannakoti vattabbo, nirodhe diṭṭhe na vattabbaṃ—

kv2.9:16.1.pli: Dukkhe diṭṭhe cattāri saccāni diṭṭhāni hontīti?

kv2.9:17.1.pli: Rūpakkhandhe aniccato diṭṭhe pañcakkhandhā aniccato diṭṭhā hontīti?

kv2.9:18.1.pli: Cakkhāyatane aniccato diṭṭhe dvādasāyatanāni aniccato diṭṭhāni hontīti?

kv2.9:19.1.pli: Cakkhudhātuyā aniccato diṭṭhāya aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo aniccato diṭṭhā hontīti?

kv2.9:20.1.pli: Cakkhundriye aniccato diṭṭhe bāvīsatindriyāni aniccato diṭṭhāni hontīti?

kv2.9:22.5.pli: “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro, na āyatakeneva papāto;

kv2.9:22.6.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, imasmiṃ dhammavinaye anupubbasikkhā anupubbakiriyā anupubbapaṭipadā, na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho”ti.

kv2.9:26.4.pli: “sammukhā metaṃ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ—

kv2.9:26.5.pli: ‘yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati dukkhasamudayampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadampi passati;

kv2.9:26.6.pli: yo dukkhasamudayaṃ passati dukkhampi so passati, dukkhanirodhampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadampi passati;

kv2.9:26.7.pli: yo dukkhanirodhaṃ passati dukkhampi so passati, dukkhasamudayampi passati, dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadampi passati;

kv2.9:26.8.pli: yo dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ passati dukkhampi so passati, dukkhasamudayampi passati, dukkhanirodhampi passatī’”ti.

kv2.9:30.4.pli: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—

kv2.9:30.5.pli: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—
